p: Ascorbic acid content was increased with the application of AA and EO+AA on the second day, while chitosan lowered ascorbic acid of fresh-cut lettuce on the same day ( Figure 6B). Moreover, increased ascorbic acid content was revealed with the application of chitosan, chlorine, EO+AA, and AA higher values on the fourth day, while EO+AA and chlorine increased ascorbic acid during the last day of storage.
